title: How are the Jewish doing?
description: Let's dwelve into our first blog by doing a small visualisation exercise of the covid situation in Israel! I intend to make this first blog to be less formal but more friendly, so we can get to know each other better. Let's visualize together!

title: The current state of a kingdom
description: Today we will have a tour down history of one of the greatest countries in the historical time - one that was refered to as the "cradle of civilization" - Iraq

title: Welcome to New thing per day
description:
Welcome to our new blog, New thing per day. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!
